snippet: BARR--Miriam L. Peacefully at age 99, March 10, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Irving, mother of Kathy (Ed) and Jeffrey; Step-mother of Richard (Linda); grandmother of Sara, Nora, Elizabeth and Jacob; Johanna and Abigail. Funeral private. Shiva Sunday 4-8pm at home of Jeffrey; Monday-Wednesday at home of Cantor Kathy Barr. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BARR--Miriam L. Peacefully at age 99, March 10, 2016. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BARR, MIRIAM L
